channel.title: Poodle Attack only to Web services
channel.description: Poodle attack is the famous topic for now Is this attack only specific to Web Service that if it have only https link with it..?? There are also other service which use SSL v3 so they are affected or not affected by poodle attack...???

item.description:
Poodle attack is the famous topic for now
Is this attack only specific to Web Service that if it have only https link with it…??
There are also other service which use SSL v3 so they are affected or not affected by poodle attack…???
